core.speak: 504 Occupational Therapy update for Armand Lefebvre. As of November 2025, OT services have been discontinued. Armand made good progress in executive function, hand fatigue, self-regulation, and visual motor skills.

updates.summary: Working on executive function, hand fatigue, self-regulation, and visual motor skills. Making good progress.

executive_function.attention: Improves with hands-on tasks with concrete start and end without many steps
executive_function.multi_step: Requires verbal and visual cues to begin. Once started, can typically finish.

hand_fatigue.progress: Completed 7-sentence paragraph copying with only one hand shake/stretch

visual_motor.handwriting: Very legible when copying from near point

updates.recommendation: Continue on consultative basis until end of first marking period of 4th grade

updates.summary: Has not required direct or indirect school-based consultative services this marking period

accommodations.text: Pencil grip on writing implement to decrease pressure on pencil, reducing hand fatigue
Multi-step activities/projects: Break down assignments into smaller more manageable parts
Allow Armand to stand and/or sit to complete assignments
